spas
Class Observation

java.lang.Object
  spas.Observation
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObservation
public class Observation
extends java.lang.Object
implements IObservation

An observation holds the significant consequences that the enacted interaction had on the spatial system. It is the structure that supports the interaction between the spatial system (spas) and the intrinsic motivation system (imos).

Author:
Olivier
